content: rainbow baby doll crochet blanket designed by christina groneck me sew krazee finished size 15 5 inches point to point yarn big twist value 100% acrylic 1 skein each white sky blue pale pink pale yellow mint pale peach soft purple crochet hook 5 00 mm adjust hook size as needed stitch abbreviations chain chain small shell double_crochet ch2 double_crochet st/sts stitch/es large shell 2dc ch2 2dc slip_stitch slip_stitch double_crochet double_crochet skip skip space - space important notes always crochet over your ends to lessen the work at finishing do not chain 3 at beginning of round it will be very visible example color pattern a soft purple e pale peach b sky blue f pale pink c mint g - white d pale yellow me sew õ krazee /blue heeler crochet pattern /page 1 of 3 rainbow baby doll crochet blanket pattern using color a create a magic_ring row 1 chain 2 work 12 double_crochet into ring join with a sl st in the top st of the ch2 at beginning row 2 chain 2 double_crochet into same st 2 double_crochet in each double_crochet around for a total of 24 double_crochet join row 3 ch2 *skip the next double_crochet work a small shell into next double_crochet * repeat around join row 4 slip_stitch into the next double_crochet work a large shell into next ch2 space * repeat around join row 5 change to color g slip_stitch into next double_crochet ch2 *work a small shell into next ch2 space double_crochet in next double_crochet skip 2 double_crochet in the next double_crochet* repeat around join 48 double_crochet 12 ch2 row 6 change to color b slip_stitch into next double_crochet chain 2 * work a large shell in chain 2 space double_crochet in next double_crochet skip next 2 double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet repeat from * around join row 7 change to color c slip_stitch into next double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet * work a large shell in chain 2 space double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet skip next 2 double_crochet double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet repeat from * around join row 8 change to color d slip_stitch into next double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet * a small shell in chain 2 space double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet skip next 2 double_crochet double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet repeat from * around join row 9 change to color e slip_stitch into next double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in next 2dc * a large shell in chain 2 space double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet skip next 2 double_crochet double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet repeat from * around join row 10 change to color g slip_stitch into next double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet * a small shell in chain 2 space double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet skip next 2 double_crochet double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet repeat from * around join row 11 change to color f slip_stitch into next double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet * a large
